      • isURL

        protected static boolean isURL(java.lang.String pathString)
        Given a string, check if it is a URL - URL, according to our definition is the presence of two consecutive forward slashes //
        Parameters:
        pathString - string representing a path
        Returns:
        true if the pathString is a URL, else false
